project.name: Class Projects Root
project.description: This project is the root project for class project artifacts. It contains test data generators and examples for getting started with the class project. As a general rule, the test data is not to be re-implemented by the student. You will re-use the instructor-provided version as a pre-compiled resource. You will implement your version of the sample application found here that uses that test data. Use the sample application as a good source of solving some of the Maven setup required to create your implementation of the class project.
